subject: URGENT: Expedited IME Needed
body:
URGENT REQUEST

Need immediate IME for workers comp case.

Name: David Kim
Case: WC-2025-1156
Exam: Neurology

This is time-sensitive - depositions scheduled for April 20th. Need exam done THIS WEEK and report by April 18th latest.

No location preference, patient will travel.

Please advise ASAP if you can accommodate.

Thank you,
Mark Stevens
Legal Services Group
